title: You can't beat the location for this 1 bed avail 9/1
posting_body: A short stroll from the Magnificent Mile and fabled State and Rush Streets, a turn-of-the-20th-century hotel has been transformed into a classic Chicago rental.
A sneak preview of your new place...hardwoods floors, large walk-in closets, new appliances including dishwasher and microwave, and the great perks of complimentary amenities such as fiber internet.
Other lifestyle essentials you'll have include an on-site laundry, fitness center and a secure bike storage room, all of it just two blocks from public transit and minutes from Oak Street Beach.
Live in bliss at your fabulous Gold Coast Apartment.
